verses.verse: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> spake יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> unto Moses בֹּ֖א <WH935> Go אֶל־ <WH413> to פַּרְעֹ֑ה <WH6547> unto Pharaoh וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> and say אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> to him כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> unto him Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD שַׁלַּ֥ח <WH7971> go אֶת־ <WH853> עַמִּ֖י <WH5971> Let my people וְיַֽעַבְדֻֽנִי׃ <WH5647> that they may serve

וְאִם־ <WH518> if מָאֵ֥ן <WH3986> And if thou refuse אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you לְשַׁלֵּ֑חַ <WH7971> to let [them] go הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> behold אָנֹכִ֗י <WH595> I נֹגֵ֛ף <WH5062> behold I will smite אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> your whole גְּבוּלְךָ֖ <WH1366> all thy borders בַּֽצְפַרְדְּעִֽים׃ <WH6854> with frogs

וְשָׁרַ֣ץ <WH8317> abundantly הַיְאֹר֮ <WH2975> And the river צְפַרְדְּעִים֒ <WH6854> frogs וְעָלוּ֙ <WH5927> which shall go up וּבָ֣אוּ <WH935> and come בְּבֵיתֶ֔ךָ <WH1004> into thine house וּבַחֲדַ֥ר <WH2315> chamber מִשְׁכָּבְךָ֖ <WH4904> bed וְעַל־ <WH5921> and on מִטָּתֶ֑ךָ <WH4296> and upon thy bed וּבְבֵ֤ית <WH1004> and into the house עֲבָדֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5650> of thy servants וּבְעַמֶּ֔ךָ <WH5971> and upon thy people וּבְתַנּוּרֶ֖יךָ <WH8574> and into thine ovens וּבְמִשְׁאֲרוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH4863> and into thy kneadingtroughs

וּבְכָ֥ה וּֽבְעַמְּךָ֖ <WH5971> both on thee and upon thy people וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> and all עֲבָדֶ֑יךָ <WH5650> and upon all thy servants יַעֲל֖וּ <WH5927> shall come up הַֽצְפַרְדְּעִֽים׃ <WH6854> And the frogs

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> spake יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁה֒ <WH4872> unto Moses אֱמֹ֣ר <WH559> Say אֶֽל־ <WH413> to אַהֲרֹ֗ן <WH175> unto Aaron נְטֵ֤ה <WH5186> Stretch forth אֶת־ <WH853> יָדְךָ֙ <WH3027> thine hand בְּמַטֶּ֔ךָ <WH4294> with thy rod עַל־ <WH5921> over הַ֨נְּהָרֹ֔ת <WH5104> over the streams עַל־ <WH5921> over הַיְאֹרִ֖ים <WH2975> over the rivers וְעַל־ <WH5921> and over הָאֲגַמִּ֑ים <WH98> and over the ponds וְהַ֥עַל <WH5927> to come up אֶת־ <WH853> הַֽצְפַרְדְּעִ֖ים <WH6854> and cause frogs עַל־ <WH5921> over אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> upon the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt

וַיֵּ֤ט <WH5186> stretched out אַהֲרֹן֙ <WH175> And Aaron אֶת־ <WH853> יָד֔וֹ <WH3027> his hand עַ֖ל <WH5921> over מֵימֵ֣י <WH4325> over the waters מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וַתַּ֙עַל֙ <WH5927> came up הַצְּפַרְדֵּ֔עַ <WH6854> and the frogs וַתְּכַ֖ס <WH3680> and covered אֶת־ <WH853> אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt

וַיַּֽעֲשׂוּ־ <WH6213> did כֵ֥ן <WH3651> the same הַֽחֲרְטֻמִּ֖ים <WH2748> And the magicians בְּלָטֵיהֶ֑ם <WH3909> so with their enchantments וַיַּעֲל֥וּ <WH5927> and brought up אֶת־ <WH853> הַֽצְפַרְדְּעִ֖ים <WH6854> frogs עַל־ <WH5921> on אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> upon the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt

וַיִּקְרָ֨א <WH7121> called פַרְעֹ֜ה <WH6547> Then Pharaoh לְמֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH4872> for Moses וּֽלְאַהֲרֹ֗ן <WH175> and Aaron וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> and said הַעְתִּ֣ירוּ <WH6279> Intreat אֶל־ <WH413> about יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD וְיָסֵר֙ <WH5493> that he may take away הַֽצְפַרְדְּעִ֔ים <WH6854> the frogs מִמֶּ֖נִּי <WH4480> and from וּמֵֽעַמִּ֑י <WH5971> from me and from my people וַאֲשַׁלְּחָה֙ <WH7971> go אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> and I will let the people וְיִזְבְּח֖וּ <WH2076> that they may do sacrifice לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said מֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH4872> And Moses לְפַרְעֹה֮ <WH6547> unto Pharaoh הִתְפָּאֵ֣ר <WH6286> Glory עָלַי֒ <WH5921> and לְמָתַ֣י ׀ <WH4970> over me when אַעְתִּ֣יר <WH6279> shall I intreat לְךָ֗ וְלַעֲבָדֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5650> for thee and for thy servants וּֽלְעַמְּךָ֔ <WH5971> and for thy people לְהַכְרִית֙ <WH3772> to destroy הַֽצֲפַרְדְּעִ֔ים <WH6854> the frogs מִמְּךָ֖ <WH4480> at וּמִבָּתֶּ֑יךָ <WH1004> from thee and thy houses רַ֥ק <WH7535> in בַּיְאֹ֖ר <WH2975> in the river תִּשָּׁאַֽרְנָה׃ <WH7604> [that] they may remain

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> And he said לְמָחָ֑ר <WH4279> To morrow וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> And he said כִּדְבָ֣רְךָ֔ <WH1697> [Be it] according to thy word לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> that תֵּדַ֔ע <WH3045> that thou mayest know כִּי־ <WH3588> that אֵ֖ין <WH369> there כַּיהוָ֥ה <WH3068> that [there is] none like unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <WH430> our God

וְסָר֣וּ <WH5493> shall depart הַֽצְפַרְדְּעִ֗ים <WH6854> And the frogs מִמְּךָ֙ <WH4480> at וּמִבָּ֣תֶּ֔יךָ <WH1004> from thee and from thy houses וּמֵעֲבָדֶ֖יךָ <WH5650> and from thy servants וּמֵעַמֶּ֑ךָ <WH5971> and from thy people רַ֥ק <WH7535> in בַּיְאֹ֖ר <WH2975> in the river תִּשָּׁאַֽרְנָה׃ <WH7604> they shall remain

וַיֵּצֵ֥א <WH3318> went out מֹשֶׁ֛ה <WH4872> And Moses וְאַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> and Aaron מֵעִ֣ם <WH5973> from פַּרְעֹ֑ה <WH6547> from Pharaoh וַיִּצְעַ֤ק <WH6817> cried מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> and Moses אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> unto the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> because דְּבַ֥ר <WH1697> because of הַֽצְפַרְדְּעִ֖ים <WH6854> the frogs אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which שָׂ֥ם <WH7760> which he had brought לְפַרְעֹֽה׃ <WH6547> against Pharaoh

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> did יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD כִּדְבַ֣ר <WH1697> according to the word מֹשֶׁ֑ה <WH4872> of Moses וַיָּמֻ֙תוּ֙ <WH4191> died הַֽצְפַרְדְּעִ֔ים <WH6854> and the frogs מִן־ <WH4480> out הַבָּתִּ֥ים <WH1004> out of the houses מִן־ <WH4480> at הַחֲצֵרֹ֖ת <WH2691> out of the villages וּמִן־ <WH4480> at הַשָּׂדֹֽת׃ <WH7704> and out of the fields
וַיִּצְבְּר֥וּ <WH6651> And they gathered them together אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> חֳמָרִ֣ם <WH2563> upon heaps חֳמָרִ֑ם <WH2563> heaps וַתִּבְאַ֖שׁ <WH887> stank הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> and the land

וַיַּ֣רְא <WH7200> saw פַּרְעֹ֗ה <WH6547> But when Pharaoh כִּ֤י <WH3588> for הָֽיְתָה֙ <WH1961> there was הָֽרְוָחָ֔ה <WH7309> that there was respite וְהַכְבֵּד֙ <WH3513> he hardened אֶת־ <WH853> לִבּ֔וֹ <WH3820> his heart וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> and did not שָׁמַ֖ע <WH8085> and hearkened אֲלֵהֶ֑ם <WH413> about כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> after דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> had said יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> not unto them as the LORD ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁה֒ <WH4872> unto Moses אֱמֹר֙ <WH559> Say אֶֽל־ <WH413> to אַהֲרֹ֔ן <WH175> unto Aaron נְטֵ֣ה <WH5186> Stretch out אֶֽת־ <WH853> מַטְּךָ֔ <WH4294> thy rod וְהַ֖ךְ <WH5221> and smite אֶת־ <WH853> עֲפַ֣ר <WH6083> the dust הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the land וְהָיָ֥ה <WH1961> may become לְכִנִּ֖ם <WH3654> that it may become lice בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> throughout all the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt

וַיַּֽעֲשׂוּ־ <WH6213> And they did כֵ֗ן <WH3651> so וַיֵּט֩ <WH5186> stretched out אַהֲרֹ֨ן <WH175> so for Aaron אֶת־ <WH853> יָד֤וֹ <WH3027> his hand בְמַטֵּ֙הוּ֙ <WH4294> with his rod וַיַּךְ֙ <WH5221> and smote אֶת־ <WH853> עֲפַ֣ר <WH6083> the dust הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the earth וַתְּהִי֙ <WH1961> became הַכִּנָּ֔ם <WH3654> and it became lice בָּאָדָ֖ם <WH120> in man וּבַבְּהֵמָ֑ה <WH929> and in beast כָּל־ <WH3605> All עֲפַ֥ר <WH6083> all the dust הָאָ֛רֶץ <WH776> of the land הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> became כִנִּ֖ים <WH3654> became lice בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> throughout all the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt

וַיַּעֲשׂוּ־ <WH6213> did כֵ֨ן <WH3651> after that הַחַרְטֻמִּ֧ים <WH2748> And the magicians בְּלָטֵיהֶ֛ם <WH3909> so with their enchantments לְהוֹצִ֥יא <WH3318> to bring forth אֶת־ <WH853> הַכִּנִּ֖ים <WH3654> lice וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not יָכֹ֑לוּ <WH3201> but they could וַתְּהִי֙ <WH1961> become הַכִּנָּ֔ם <WH3654> not so there were lice בָּאָדָ֖ם <WH120> upon man וּבַבְּהֵמָֽה׃ <WH929> and upon beast

וַיֹּאמְר֤וּ <WH559> said הַֽחַרְטֻמִּים֙ <WH2748> Then the magicians אֶל־ <WH413> to פַּרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> unto Pharaoh אֶצְבַּ֥ע <WH676> This [is] the finger אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> of God הִ֑וא <WH1931> This וַיֶּחֱזַ֤ק <WH2388> was hardened לֵב־ <WH3820> heart פַּרְעֹה֙ <WH6547> and Pharaoh's וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not שָׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> and he hearkened אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <WH413> about כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> after דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> had said יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> not unto them as the LORD ס

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> unto Moses הַשְׁכֵּ֤ם <WH7925> Rise up early בַּבֹּ֙קֶר֙ <WH1242> in the morning וְהִתְיַצֵּב֙ <WH3320> and stand לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before פַרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> Pharaoh הִנֵּ֖ה <WH2009> behold יוֹצֵ֣א <WH3318> lo he cometh forth הַמָּ֑יְמָה <WH4325> to the water וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> and say אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> to him כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> unto him Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD שַׁלַּ֥ח <WH7971> go עַמִּ֖י <WH5971> Let my people וְיַֽעַבְדֻֽנִי׃ <WH5647> that they may serve

כִּ֣י <WH3588> For אִם־ <WH518> if אֵינְךָ֮ <WH369> not מְשַׁלֵּ֣חַ <WH7971> go אֶת־ <WH853> עַמִּי֒ <WH5971> Else if thou wilt not let my people הִנְנִי֩ <WH2005> behold מַשְׁלִ֨יחַ <WH7971> behold I will send בְּךָ֜ וּבַעֲבָדֶ֧יךָ <WH5650> [of flies] upon thee and upon thy servants וּֽבְעַמְּךָ֛ <WH5971> and upon thy people וּבְבָתֶּ֖יךָ <WH1004> and into thy houses אֶת־ <WH853> הֶעָרֹ֑ב <WH6157> swarms וּמָ֨לְא֜וּ <WH4390> shall be full בָּתֵּ֤י <WH1004> and the houses מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4713> Egyptian אֶת־ <WH853> הֶ֣עָרֹ֔ב <WH6157> of swarms וְגַ֥ם <WH1571> and also הָאֲדָמָ֖ה <WH127> [of flies] and also the ground אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which הֵ֥ם <WH1992> like עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <WH5921> and

וְהִפְלֵיתִי֩ <WH6395> And I will sever בַיּ֨וֹם <WH3117> in that day הַה֜וּא <WH1931> he אֶת־ <WH853> אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> the land גֹּ֗שֶׁן <WH1657> of Goshen אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> where עַמִּי֙ <WH5971> in which my people עֹמֵ֣ד <WH5975> dwell עָלֶ֔יהָ <WH5921> that לְבִלְתִּ֥י <WH1115> that no הֱיֽוֹת־ <WH1961> [of flies] shall be שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> will be there עָרֹ֑ב <WH6157> swarms לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> there to the end תֵּדַ֔ע <WH3045> thou mayest know כִּ֛י <WH3588> that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD בְּקֶ֥רֶב <WH7130> in the midst הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the earth

וְשַׂמְתִּ֣י <WH7760> And I will put פְדֻ֔ת <WH6304> a division בֵּ֥ין <WH996> between עַמִּ֖י <WH5971> between my people וּבֵ֣ין <WH996> between עַמֶּ֑ךָ <WH5971> and thy people לְמָחָ֥ר <WH4279> to morrow יִהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> become הָאֹ֥ת <WH226> shall this sign הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <WH6213> did יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD כֵּ֔ן <WH3651> so וַיָּבֹא֙ <WH935> so and there came עָרֹ֣ב <WH6157> swarm כָּבֵ֔ד <WH3515> a grievous בֵּ֥יתָה <WH1004> [of flies] into the house פַרְעֹ֖ה <WH6547> of Pharaoh וּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> houses עֲבָדָ֑יו <WH5650> and [into] his servants' וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> all אֶ֧רֶץ <WH776> and into all the land מִצְרַ֛יִם <WH4714> of Egypt תִּשָּׁחֵ֥ת <WH7843> was corrupted הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> the land מִפְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> by reason הֶעָרֹֽב׃ <WH6157> of the swarm

וַיִּקְרָ֣א <WH7121> called פַרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> And Pharaoh אֶל־ <WH413> for מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> Moses וּֽלְאַהֲרֹ֑ן <WH175> and for Aaron וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> and said לְכ֛וּ <WH1980> Go זִבְח֥וּ <WH2076> ye sacrifice לֵֽאלֹהֵיכֶ֖ם <WH430> to your God בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> in the land

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> And Moses לֹ֤א <WH3808> is not נָכוֹן֙ <WH3559> It is not meet לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <WH6213> so to do כֵּ֔ן <WH3651> so כִּ֚י <WH3588> what תּוֹעֲבַ֣ת <WH8441> the abomination מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4713> Egyptian נִזְבַּ֖ח <WH2076> we shall sacrifice לַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> to the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <WH430> our God הֵ֣ן <WH2005> for נִזְבַּ֞ח <WH2076> lo shall we sacrifice אֶת־ <WH853> תּוֹעֲבַ֥ת <WH8441> the abomination מִצְרַ֛יִם <WH4713> Egyptian לְעֵינֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5869> before their eyes וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not יִסְקְלֻֽנוּ׃ <WH5619> and will they not stone

דֶּ֚רֶךְ <WH1870> journey שְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <WH7969> three יָמִ֔ים <WH3117> days' נֵלֵ֖ךְ <WH1980> go בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <WH4057> into the wilderness וְזָבַ֙חְנוּ֙ <WH2076> and sacrifice לַֽיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> to the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <WH430> our God כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> he יֹאמַ֥ר <WH559> as he shall command אֵלֵֽינוּ׃ <WH413> about
